title: Darius & Garen Idea
body:
I had a though about a set of funny skins for April fools, here is my idea seeing as Darius and Garen like to poke fun at each other with their respective taunts and other emotes because  they are essentially the same brothers fighting on opposite sides.

What if Darius got a skin of him wearing Garen`s clothes and Garen gets a skin of him wearing Darius`s clothes, does anyone else think that would be a good idea for two comedic skins for April fools?

replies.body: We already have custom taunt interactions for them when they face each other.  Already have the 1350 skin for Garen and don't play Darius enough to want a skin for him.
Ya but your 1 person what about the other people who play both champions or main them.

I'm not sure what you mean by "they are essentially the same brothers fighting on opposite sides.", but lore-wise, Garen and Darius only know each other as opponents. Darius and Draven are actual brothers, while Garen's sibling is his sister, Luxanna Crownguard (Lux, for short.) Just hope to clarify, heh "^_^
Yes I know I mean they are so similar but they fight for different armies.

I get what you mean, as the two DO have a lot of similarities.  It might also be fun to come out with some other skins between "similar" champions.  Another good couple would be Lux and Morganna, as their kits are VERY similar (Q:  Skill Shot Stun, W:  Shield, E: AoE damage) or maybe change around Volibear and Sejuani with "Bear Rider Sej" and "Voli-Boar" for fun.
